title: Orbiting satellites - change in KE from 3a to a

content.question: A small satellite of mass <math alttext="m sub S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>S</mtext></msub></math> is in an elliptical orbit around a planet of mass <math alttext="m sub P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>P</mtext></msub></math>. By how much does the satellite’s kinetic energy change when moving from its farthest distance to its closest distance from the planet’s center?
